name: Era Of Destruction
description:
Era Of Destruction is horror visual novel about life of two childrens in small village. one day they playing in the forest, and they found an amazing place. but after they go home, they found their village destroyed and villagers killed by some strange creatures that make them have to survive this catastrophe together, can they survive?

this is a demo of Era of destruction, the full version will be better from the demo , there will be many change so the full version will be better than this version.

For audio I used music from http://audionautix.com/

and don't forget to visit my fanpage : https://www.facebook.com/pages/Omega-Studio/1434514713536481?fref=ts
